dcterms:description: A subset selected from the Switchboard corpus, which consists of conversational telephone speech involving preselected topics. The subset used in the experiments covers a total of 30 topics and includes 4305 short conversations, with 3105 in the train set, 400 in the dev set, and 800 in the test set.
dcterms:title: Switchboard corpus

dcterms:description: A collection of recordings from conversational telephone speech. In this work, only 900 hours of Fisher English data are used to train the ASR, A2P, and P2W modules.
dcterms:title: Fisher English corpus
